{ 
 int a  
 a = 1  
 {  
 int a  
 a = 2  
 print(a) 
 }  
 string b 
b = "alan"  
 if (a == 1) {  
 print(b) 
 }

string c
c = "james"
b = "blackstone"
print(b)  
}
